explanation: [0-0] A man in a camouflage jacket appears at the doorway. He's wearing a black top and grey pants, with green paint on his face. The door and walls of the house are black.

[0-4] The man reveals a surprised expression at the doorway and takes a step back. The scene cuts to a white and yellow teddy bear sitting on the floor, holding a green handgun. The camera zooms in on the teddy bear.
